introduction: Olga Koch's boyfriend broke up with her on her 29th birthday and she saw the heartbreak for what it was: the perfect opportunity to finally orchestrate a threesome. Just Friends is Olga Koch's critically acclaimed standup show and roller coaster romcom you aren't tall enough to ride.In 2018, Olga Koch was nominated for the prestigious Best Newcomer award at the Edinburgh Comedy Awards and has since taken the British comedy scene by storm, making appearances on television institutions such as Mock The Week and QI, as well as touring internationally."A comic in full control of her material" - The Guardian“Superior confessional stand-up for curious minds” - The TelegraphLive show directed by Charlie Dinkin.
